Bookstrap

Bookstrap is a HTML framework for making book or magazine apps. It's designed to work on the web and within native mobile apps. It has basic functionality for page turning and navigation. It's simple to extend with a plug-in architecture.

Learn more about Bookstrap by browsing this tutorial.

  • Page turning
  • Navigation drawer
  • Navigation tabs
  • Links
  • Popovers
  • Hotspots
  • Layers
  • Flipcard
  • Animation
  • Images ‐ Full bleed
  • Images ‐ Overlaying content
  • Images – Enlarge on double tap
  • Quiz
